divs: Sighting DetailsWe were sitting in the park approx. 9:45PM before the fireworks started. My brother noticed a orange sphere and wondered what it was. Our whole family then started watching it. It was moving slowly in the sky and then approx. 30 seconds later we see another one appear next to it. We were all staring to see if we could find out what it was. they moved slowly for about another minute and then just vanished.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Mayville
This sighting has never been favorited.
